Figlet - easily create ascii art

2021-08-31-00-00 â€¢ Johannes

A small tool I have used for a few years for many purposes is figlet. You can use it to easily convert text into ASCII-Art of text.

The most basic usage looks like this:

johannes:~$ figlet text
 _            _   
| |_ _____  _| |_ 
| __/ _ \ \/ / __|
| ||  __/>  <| |_ 
 \__\___/_/\_\\__|

Links: Font library: [https://www.figlet.org/fontdb.cgi]
